oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-09-16 - KOMA
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances from the Oklahoma Round-up radio program, featuring Perry Ward (announcer), Riley Shepard (host/performer), Chuck Davis (performer) and his Roundup Boys, Ann Bond (performer), the Thomas Family Trio (performers), and Lem Hawkins (performer) on September 16, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Riley Shepard; Chuck Davis; Ann Bond; Thomas Family Trio; Lem Hawkins; Roundup Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Riley Shepard talks -- Perry Ward talks -- Opening statement ([Unidentified]) -- Opening theme -- [Unidentified] introduces Jack Beasley, Ann Bond, the Thomas Family Trio, Lem Hawkins, and Chuck Davis and his Roundup Boys -- Perry Ward introduces Riley Shepard -- Riley Shepard talks -- Baby, Can You Laugh At That (Riley Shepard) -- Riley Shepard introduces the Thomas Family Trio -- Maple On The Hill (Thomas Family Trio) -- Riley Shepard introduces Ann Bond -- Ann Bond talks -- The Little Old Church In The Valley (Ann Bond) -- Riley Shepard introduces Chuck Davis and his Roundup Boys -- Tuck Me To Sleep In My Old Kentucky Home (Chuck Davis and his Roundup Boys) [unconfirmed] -- Riley Shepard talks -- Lem Hawkins talks -- Shut The Door, They're Coming Through The Window (Lem Hawkins) -- Riley Shepard talks -- Riley Shepard introduces Chuck Davis and his Roundup Boys) -- [Unidentified instrumental] (Chuck Davis and his Roundup Boys) (incomplete) [unconfirmed] -- [Unidentified] talks -- [Unidentified] introduces Jack Beasley, Ann Bond, the Thomas Family Trio, Lem Hawkins, and Chuck Davis and his Roundup Boys -- Riley Shepard talks -- Sweet Georgia Brown (Chuck Davis and his Roundup Boys) (incomplete) [unconfirmed]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Shepard, Riley; Beasley, Jack; Bond, Ann; Davis, Chuck; Ward, Perry, 1914-1989;
